definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Nu 35:2 common, common-land, open land (perhaps orig. pasture-land, as place of [cattle] driving)—abs. ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 45:2 + 2 t. + Ez Eze 48:15 (Co [[מגרשָׁהּ]]); cstr. [[מִגְרַשׁ]] Le 25:34, 2Ch 31:19; (on [[מִגְרָשָׁהּ]] Ez Eze 36:5 cf. [[גרשׁ]]); elsewh. pl., abs. [[מִגְרשׁוֹת]] Ez Eze 27:28 (Baer); Co [[מרעשׁת]] assumed fr. [[רָעַשׁ]], cf. LXX; cstr. [[מִגְרְשֵׁי]] Nu 35:4 + 2 t.; sf. [[מִגְרָשֶׁיהָ]] Jos 21:13, Jos 21:13 + 42 t.; [[מִגְרָשֶׁהָ]] Jos 21:11 + 46 t. in Jos 21 (generally [[֑]] or . + but also [[â]] v:Jos 21:21); [[מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶם]] Nu 35:3 + 4 t.; [[מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶן]] Nu 35:7 + 8 t.—common-land, usually pl., and usually as attached to a city or town, esp. as surrounding Levitical cities Nu 35:2, Nu 35:3, Nu 35:4, Nu 35:5, Nu 35:7, Jos 14:4, Jos 21:2 + 55 t. Jos 21 (all P; in Codd. & old Vrss. are two vv. Jos 21, betw. v:Jos 21:35, v:Jos 21:36, with ´[[מ]] 4 t.; om. Mass., Edd., Baer, but cf. Theile, & Di ad loc.); 1Ch 6:40 + 40 t. 1Ch 6, 1Ch 13:2, 2Ch 11:14; so also ´[[שְׂדֵה מ]] Le 25:34 (H), ´[[שְׂדֵי מ]] 2Ch 31:19; lands surrounding the holy city Ez Eze 48:15, Eze 48:17; open land or space about the temple Ez Eze 45:2; only 1Ch 5:16 [[כל־מִגְרְשֵׁי שָׁרוֹן]] of (pasture-) lands in a district, cf. [[שׁרון]].—Ez Eze 27:28 [[מגרשׁות]], if true text, = open country about Tyre (opp. sea, cf. context), but v. Da & cf. supr.
